name: forecast
description: Data sets of expected meteorological conditions for a specified time or period in the future, typically including the T+0 fields.

name: analysis
description: Data sets of analysed meteorological conditions for a specified time or period in the past.

name: reanalysis
description: Data sets constructing a record of past conditions.

name: hindcast
description: Data sets of retrospective forecast for a specified time or period in the past.
